definition: to overturn/to collapse/to lean/to tend/to incline/to pour out
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Tilting device of converter is the most important mechanical equipment on steel-making.
sentences.chinese: 轉爐傾動裝置是轉爐鍊鋼最主要的機械設備。

sentences.english: In addition, the utility model reduces the barycenter of the torpedo hot metal mixer car, and makes the running steadiness during moving.
sentences.chinese: 同時，降低混鐵車的重心，使其運行及傾動平穩。
